blocks.name: ax-reg
blocks.content: Axiom of Regularity. An axiom of Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory. Also called the Axiom of Foundation. A rather non-intuitive axiom that denies more than it asserts, it states (in the form of ~ zfreg ) that every nonempty set contains a set disjoint from itself. One consequence is that it denies the existence of a set containing itself ( ~ elirrv ). A stronger version that works for proper classes is proved as ~ zfregs . (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: axreg2
blocks.content: Axiom of Regularity expressed more compactly. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-2003.)

blocks.name: zfregcl
blocks.content: The Axiom of Regularity with class variables. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1994.) Replace sethood hypothesis with sethood antecedent. (Revised by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfregcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0))))), wi(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  rexeqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  ralbidv(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  exlimi(s0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  nfre1(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))))
  axreg2(s0, hs0, s1)
  bitr2i(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))), wrex(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), wrex(s0, cv(hs0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))))
  rexbii(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  df-ral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  df-rex(s0, cv(hs0), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfregcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ c0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ c0))), (∃(s0, s0 ∈ hs0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, ∃(s0, s0 ∈ hs0), ∃(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)), ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ c0)))
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, s0 ∈ hs0, s0 ∈ c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  rexeqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ c0))
  ralbidv(s1, s0, hs0 = c0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0, ¬ s1 ∈ c0)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, s1 ∈ hs0, s1 ∈ c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s1)
  exlimi(s0, s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)))
  nfre1(s0, hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0))
  sylib(s0 ∈ hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)), ∃(s0,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)))))
  axreg2(s0, hs0, s1)
  bitr2i(∃(s0,(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)))), ∃(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)), ∃(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ¬ s1 ∈ hs0))))
  rexbii(s0, hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0), ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)))
  df-ral(s1, s0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)
  df-rex(s0, hs0, ∀(s1,(s1 ∈ s0 → ¬ s1 ∈ hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ¬ s1 ∈ c0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: zfreg
blocks.content: The Axiom of Regularity using abbreviations. Axiom 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 21. This is called the "weak form". Axiom Reg of [BellMachover] p. 480. There is also a "strong form", not requiring that ` A ` be a set, that can be proved with more difficulty (see ~ zfregs ). (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.) Replace sethood hypothesis with sethood antecedent. (Revised by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfreg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  biimpi(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  n0(s0, c0)
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  zfregcl(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  biimpri(wrex(s0, c0, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls)))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wceq(cin(cv(s0), c0), emptycls), wral(hs0, cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  disj(hs0, cv(s0), c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfreg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c0)= ∅))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  3syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c0)= ∅), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  anim2i(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0))
  biimpi(c0 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0))
  n0(s0, c0)
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  zfregcl(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  biimpri(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 ⋂ c0)= ∅))
  rexbii(s0, c0, (s0 ⋂ c0)= ∅, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0))
  disj(hs0, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
}

blocks.name: elirrv
blocks.content: The membership relation is irreflexive: no set is a member of itself. Theorem 105 of [Suppes] p. 54. (This is trivial to prove from ~ zfregfr and ~ efrirr , but this proof is direct from the Axiom of Regularity.) (Contributed by NM, 19-Aug-1993.)
blocks.origin:
thm elirrv(setvar s0) {
  |- wn(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
} = {
  mt2(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wrex(hs1, csn(cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))))
  mp2(wrex(hs1, csn(cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))))
  snex(cv(s0))
  spei(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0))))
  eleq1w(hs1, s0, csn(cv(s0)))
  zfregcl(hs1, hs0, csn(cv(s0)), universe)
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wn(wrex(hs1, csn(cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))), wral(hs1, csn(cv(s0)), wn(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))))
  ralrimiv(hs1, csn(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wn(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))))
  con2d(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0))), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  nsyli(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))
  velsn(hs1, cv(s0))
  com12(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  equcoms(hs1, s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))
  ax9(s0, hs1, s0)
  mt2i(wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0))))
  vsnid(s0)
  rspccv(hs0, cv(hs1), cv(s0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0))))
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, csn(cv(s0)))
  ralnex(hs1, csn(cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(cv(s0), csn(cv(s0)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elirrv(setvar s0) {
  ⊢ ¬ s0 ∈ s0
} = {
  mt2(s0 ∈ s0, ∃(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 })))
  mp2(∃(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 })), { s0 } ∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ { s0 }))
  snex(s0)
  spei(hs1, s0, hs1 ∈ { s0 }, s0 ∈ { s0 })
  eleq1w(hs1, s0, { s0 })
  zfregcl(hs1, hs0, { s0 }, universe)
  sylib(s0 ∈ s0, ¬ ∃(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 })), ∀(hs1 ∈ { s0 }, ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 })))
  ralrimiv(hs1, { s0 }, s0 ∈ s0, ¬ ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 }))
  con2d(s0 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ { s0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 }))
  nsyli(s0 ∈ s0, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 }), hs1 ∈ { s0 }, s0 ∈ hs1)
  syl5bi(s0 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ { s0 }, s0 ∈ hs1, hs1 = s0)
  velsn(hs1, s0)
  com12(s0 ∈ s0, hs1 = s0, s0 ∈ hs1)
  equcoms(hs1, s0, (s0 ∈ s0 → s0 ∈ hs1))
  ax9(s0, hs1, s0)
  mt2i(∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 }), s0 ∈ hs1, s0 ∈ { s0 })
  vsnid(s0)
  rspccv(hs0, hs1, s0, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 }, ¬ s0 ∈ { s0 })
  notbid(hs0 = s0, hs0 ∈ { s0 }, s0 ∈ { s0 })
  eleq1w(hs0, s0, { s0 })
  ralnex(hs1, { s0 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 }))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 })
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 })
  diff.hs1.w(s0 ∈ s0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ s0 ∈ { s0 })
}

blocks.name: elirr
blocks.content: No class is a member of itself. Exercise 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)

blocks.name: elneq
blocks.content: A class is not equal to any of its elements. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2022.)

blocks.name: nelaneq
blocks.content: A class is not an element of and equal to a class at the same time. Variant of ~ elneq analogously to ~ elnotel and ~ en2lp . (Proposed by BJ, 18-Jun-2022.) (Contributed by AV, 18-Jun-2022.)

blocks.name: epinid0
blocks.content: The membership (epsilon) relation and the identity relation are disjoint. Variable-free version of ~ nelaneq . (Proposed by BJ, 18-Jun-2022.) (Contributed by AV, 18-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm epinid0() {
  |- wceq(cin(cep, cid), emptycls)
} = {
  3eqtri(cin(cep, cid), emptycls, cin(copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  ineq12i(cep, cid, copab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), copab(hs0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  df-eprel(hs0, hs1)
  df-id(hs0, hs1)
  inopab(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  mpbir(wceq(copab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), emptycls), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  nelaneq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  opab0(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm epinid0() {
  ⊢ (∈ ⋂ =)= ∅
} = {
  3eqtri((∈ ⋂ =), emptycls, ({ < hs0, hs1 > | hs0 ∈ hs1 } ⋂ { < hs0, hs1 > | hs0 = hs1 }), { < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs0 = hs1)})
  ineq12i(cep, cid, { < hs0, hs1 > | hs0 ∈ hs1 }, { < hs0, hs1 > | hs0 = hs1 })
  df-eprel(hs0, hs1)
  df-id(hs0, hs1)
  inopab(hs0, hs1, hs0 ∈ hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  mpbir({ < hs0, hs1 > |(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs0 = hs1)} = ∅, ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1, ¬(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs0 = hs1))))
  gen2(hs0, hs1, ¬(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs0 = hs1))
  nelaneq(hs0, hs1)
  opab0(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs0 = hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: sucprcreg
blocks.content: A class is equal to its successor iff it is a proper class (assuming the Axiom of Regularity). (Contributed by NM, 9-Jul-2004.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 16-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sucprcreg(class c0) {
  |- wb(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csuc(c0), c0))
} = {
  impbii(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csuc(c0), c0))
  sucprc(c0)
  imnani(wceq(csuc(c0), c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  mto(wa(wceq(csuc(c0), c0), wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c0, c0))
  elirr(c0)
  syl2an(wceq(csuc(c0), c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, c0), wss(csn(c0), c0), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  sylbb2(wceq(csuc(c0), c0), wss(csn(c0), c0), wceq(cun(c0, csn(c0)), c0))
  eqeq1i(csuc(c0), c0, cun(c0, csn(c0)))
  df-suc(c0)
  ssequn2(csn(c0), c0)
  snidg(c0, universe)
  ssel2(csn(c0), c0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sucprcreg(class c0) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ↔ suc(c0)= c0)
} = {
  impbii(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= c0)
  sucprc(c0)
  imnani(suc(c0)= c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mto((suc(c0)= c0 ∧ c0 ∈ 𝕌), c0 ∈ c0)
  elirr(c0)
  syl2an(suc(c0)= c0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c0, { c0 } ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ { c0 })
  sylbb2(suc(c0)= c0, { c0 } ⊆ c0, (c0 ⋃ { c0 })= c0)
  eqeq1i(suc(c0), c0, (c0 ⋃ { c0 }))
  df-suc(c0)
  ssequn2({ c0 }, c0)
  snidg(c0, universe)
  ssel2({ c0 }, c0, c0)
}

blocks.name: ruv
blocks.content: The Russell class is equal to the universe ` _V ` . Exercise 5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Oct-2008.)

blocks.name: ruALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ ru , simplified using (indirectly) the Axiom of Regularity ~ ax-reg . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Oct-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: zfregfr
blocks.content: The membership relation is well-founded on any class. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfregfr(class c0) {
  |- wfr(cep, c0)
} = {

  mpan(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wrex(hs1, cv(hs0), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))

blocks.name: en3lp
blocks.content: No class has 3-cycle membership loops. This proof was automatically generated from the virtual deduction proof ~ en3lpVD using a translation program. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 24-Oct-2011.)

thm en3lp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)))
} = {
  pm2.61ine(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls, wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))))
  intn3an3d(wceq(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  nsyl(wceq(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, ctp(c0, c1, c2)))
  mtbiri(wceq(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, ctp(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c2, emptycls))
  noel(c2)
  eleq2(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls, c2)
  tpid3g(c2, c0, c0, c1)
  syl(wne(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))), wrex(hs0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), emptycls)))
  mpan(wne(ctp(c0, c1, c2), emptycls), wrex(hs0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), emptycls)), wcel(ctp(c0, c1, c2), universe))
  tpex(c0, c1, c2)
  zfreg(hs0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), universe)
  rexlimiv(hs0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), emptycls), wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))))
  necon2bd(cin(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), emptycls, wcel(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(cin(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), emptycls))
  en3lplem2(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(ctp(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  mpan({ c0, c1, c2 } ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 },(hs0 ⋂ { c0, c1, c2 })= ∅), { c0, c1, c2 } ∈ 𝕌)

  necon2bd((hs0 ⋂ { c0, c1, c2 }), emptycls, hs0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0))

thm preleqg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c4))), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))
} = {
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3))))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)))), wne(c0, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wne(c0, c1))
  elneq(c0, c1)
  preq12nebg(c0, c1, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  com12(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))
  jao1i(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)))
  com12(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))
  3imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wi(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4))))
  a1d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c3, c4), wi(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))))
  com3l(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))
  syl6bi(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c3, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4))), wcel(c4, c3))
  eleq12(c0, c4, c1, c3)
  pm2.21d(wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c3, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c4)))
  elnotel(c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: preleq
blocks.content: Equality of two unordered pairs when one member of each pair contains the other member. (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1996.) (Revised by AV, 15-Jun-2022.)

blocks.name: preleqALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ preleq , not based on ~ preleqg : Equality of two unordered pairs when one member of each pair contains the other member. (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1996.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm preleqALT(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  pm2.43a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))))
  con4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  syl6(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3))), wn(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)))
  ord(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c3, universe)))
  jctr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  jctr(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c3, universe))
  preq12bg(c0, c1, c1, universe, c2, c3, c3, universe)
  mtbiri(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c2, c3)))
  en2lp(c3, c2)
  anbi1d(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c3, c2))
  eleq12(c0, c3, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: opthreg
blocks.content: Theorem for alternate representation of ordered pairs, requiring the Axiom of Regularity ~ ax-reg (via the ~ preleq step). See ~ df-op for a description of other ordered pair representations. Exercise 34 of [Enderton] p. 207. (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1996.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm opthreg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wceq(cpr(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c2, cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  impbii(wceq(cpr(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c2, cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  syl(wceq(cpr(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c2, cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3))))
  mpanl12(wceq(cpr(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c2, cpr(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c3)))
  prid1(c0, c1)
  prid1(c2, c3)
  preleq(c0, cpr(c0, c1), c2, cpr(c2, c3))
  prex(c0, c1)
  imdistani(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)))
  eqeq1d(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c2, c1), wceq(c0, c2))
  preq1(c0, c2, c1)
  preqr2(c2, c1, c3)
  eqtrd(cpr(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c2, cpr(c2, c3)), cpr(c2, cpr(c0, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  adantr(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cpr(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), cpr(c2, cpr(c0, c1))))
  preq1(c0, c2, cpr(c0, c1))
  preq2d(c2, cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  preq12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: suc11reg
blocks.content: The successor operation behaves like a one-to-one function (assuming the Axiom of Regularity). Exercise 35 of [Enderton] p. 208 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm suc11reg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
} = {
  impbii(wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  4cases(wi(wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  mpi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wi(wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, c0))))
  mpbi(wo(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, c0))), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0))))
  en2lp(c0, c1)
  ianor(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  jaao(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wi(wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  com23(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wi(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  ord(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1))), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  imp(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wo(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1)))
  sylibd(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wo(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, csuc(c1)))
  syl5ibcom(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wcel(c0, csuc(c1)), wcel(c0, csuc(c0)))
  sucidg(c0, universe)
  eleq2(csuc(c0), csuc(c1), c0)
  elsucg(c0, universe, c1)
  com23(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wi(wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  syl6ib(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1))), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c1, c0))
  ord(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1))), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0))
  imp(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wo(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)))
  sylibd(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wo(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0)), wcel(c1, csuc(c0)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wcel(c1, csuc(c0)), wcel(c1, csuc(c1)))
  sucidg(c1, universe)
  eleq2(csuc(c0), csuc(c1), c1)
  elsucg(c1, universe, c0)
  eqcom(c1, c0)
  pm2.21d(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl2anb(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c1, universe)), wn(wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1))), wcel(csuc(c0), universe), wn(wcel(csuc(c1), universe)))
  notbii(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(csuc(c1), universe))
  nelneq(csuc(c0), universe, csuc(c1))
  syl5bi(wa(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(csuc(c1), csuc(c0)))
  eqcom(csuc(c0), csuc(c1))
  pm2.21d(wa(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(csuc(c1), csuc(c0)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ancoms(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c1, universe), wn(wceq(csuc(c1), csuc(c0))))
  syl2anb(wcel(c1, universe), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wceq(csuc(c1), csuc(c0))), wcel(csuc(c1), universe), wn(wcel(csuc(c0), universe)))
  sucexb(c1)
  notbii(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(csuc(c0), universe))
  sucexb(c0)
  nelneq(csuc(c1), universe, csuc(c0))
  biimpd(wa(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wcel(c1, universe))), wceq(csuc(c0), csuc(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  eqeqan12d(csuc(c0), csuc(c1), c0, c1, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  sucprc(c0)
  sucprc(c1)
  suceq(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm suc11reg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (suc(c0)= suc(c1)↔ c0 = c1)
} = {
  impbii(suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 = c1)
  4cases((suc(c0)= suc(c1)→ c0 = c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpi((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), (suc(c0)= suc(c1)→ c0 = c1), (¬ c0 ∈ c1 ∨ ¬ c1 ∈ c0))
  mpbi((¬ c0 ∈ c1 ∨ ¬ c1 ∈ c0), ¬(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c1 ∈ c0))
  en2lp(c0, c1)
  ianor(c0 ∈ c1, c1 ∈ c0)
  jaao(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c0 ∈ c1, ¬ c1 ∈ c0, (suc(c0)= suc(c1)→ c0 = c1))
  com23(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c0 ∈ c1, suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 = c1)
  ex(c0 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), (¬ c0 ∈ c1 → c0 = c1))
  ord((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ suc(c0)= suc(c1)), c0 ∈ c1, c0 = c1)
  imp(c0 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), (c0 ∈ c1 ∨ c0 = c1))
  sylibd(c0 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), (c0 ∈ c1 ∨ c0 = c1), c0 ∈ suc(c1))
  syl5ibcom(c0 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 ∈ suc(c1), c0 ∈ suc(c0))
  sucidg(c0, universe)
  eleq2(suc(c0), suc(c1), c0)
  elsucg(c0, universe, c1)
  com23(c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c1 ∈ c0, suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 = c1)
  ex(c1 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), (¬ c1 ∈ c0 → c0 = c1))
  syl6ib((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ suc(c0)= suc(c1)), ¬ c1 ∈ c0, c0 = c1, c1 = c0)
  ord((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ suc(c0)= suc(c1)), c1 ∈ c0, c1 = c0)
  imp(c1 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), (c1 ∈ c0 ∨ c1 = c0))
  sylibd(c1 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), (c1 ∈ c0 ∨ c1 = c0), c1 ∈ suc(c0))
  syl5ibrcom(c1 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)= suc(c1), c1 ∈ suc(c0), c1 ∈ suc(c1))
  sucidg(c1, universe)
  eleq2(suc(c0), suc(c1), c1)
  elsucg(c1, universe, c0)
  eqcom(c1, c0)
  pm2.21d((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 = c1)
  syl2anb(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ suc(c0)= suc(c1), suc(c0)∈ 𝕌, ¬ suc(c1)∈ 𝕌)
  notbii(c1 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c1)∈ 𝕌)
  nelneq(suc(c0), universe, suc(c1))
  syl5bi((¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 = c1, suc(c1)= suc(c0))
  eqcom(suc(c0), suc(c1))
  pm2.21d((¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), suc(c1)= suc(c0), c0 = c1)
  ancoms(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ suc(c1)= suc(c0))
  syl2anb(c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ suc(c1)= suc(c0), suc(c1)∈ 𝕌, ¬ suc(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  sucexb(c1)
  notbii(c0 ∈ 𝕌, suc(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  sucexb(c0)
  nelneq(suc(c1), universe, suc(c0))
  biimpd((¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌), suc(c0)= suc(c1), c0 = c1)
  eqeqan12d(suc(c0), suc(c1), c0, c1, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  sucprc(c0)
  sucprc(c1)
  suceq(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: dford2
blocks.content: Assuming ~ ax-reg , an ordinal is a transitive class on which inclusion satisfies trichotomy. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Oct-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm dford2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(word(c0), wa(wtr(c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(word(c0), wa(wtr(c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wa(wtr(c0), wwe(cep, c0)))
  df-ord(c0)
  anbi2i(wtr(c0), wwe(cep, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  bitri(wwe(cep, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), cep, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cep, cv(s0))))))
  mpbiran(wwe(cep, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), cep, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cep, cv(s0))))), wfr(cep, c0))
  zfregfr(c0)
  dfwe2(s0, s1, cep, c0)
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c0, c0, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), cep, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cep, cv(s0))), w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  3orbi123i(wbr(cv(s0), cep, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cep, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  epel(s1, cv(s0))
  biid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  epel(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cep.s(s0)
  diff.cep.s(s1)
}
